root.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Tag Force 4
root.description: OverviewYu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Tag Force 4 is a trading card game developed and published by Konami for the PSP platform.Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Tag Force 4 is the fourth game in the PSP exclusive Tag Force series, and is the first in the series to be based on the 5D's era of Yu-Gi-Oh!.GameplayYu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Tag Force 4 uses the official rules of the physical Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Tag Force 4 also features tag duels, which is two teams of two players which compete in alternating turns.
